wikitext.*:
The '''Marion E. Wade Center''' is a research collection of materials at [[Wikipedia:Wheaton College (Illinois)|Wheaton College, Illinois]], by and about seven British authors: [[Owen Barfield]], [[Wikipedia:G. K. Chesterton|G.K. Chesterton]], [[C.S. Lewis]], [[George MacDonald]], [[Wikipedia:Dorothy L. Sayers|Dorothy L. Sayers]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], and [[Charles Williams]].

The Marion E. Wade Center publishes the journal ''[[SEVEN|SEVEN: An Anglo-American Literary Review]]''.
